name: Classic Canadian Caesar
author: ambibambi
summary: This drink is very popular in Canada. Take a lick of the celery salt and then a drink of the Caesar through the straw for the proper Caesar experience.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon celery salt, or as needed
1 dash Worcestershire sauce, or to taste
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste
8 fluid ounces tomato and clam juice cocktail (such as Clamato®)
directions: Wet the rim of a cocktail glass with the lime wedge; set aside for garnish
Place celery salt in a small dish, and press the rim of the glass into the salt to coat
Pour vodka, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce over the ice; top with tomato-clam juice
Garnish with lime wedge and celery stick
